com.chapman.operationsaferide

Interface NotificationSystem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmailNotification, TextNotification

    public interface NotificationSystem
    Created by klamkin on 4/4/16.
    Author:
    klamkin This is an interface that interactions with both the Text Notification class and the Email Notification class. These functions will be recreated in those classes specified for their individual functions
